quotes.quote: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
Life is about your slope, not your y-intercept.
It is not how hard you hit, but how hard you get hit and keep moving forward.
If you give people the opportunity to do the right thing, you will rarely be disappointed.
If a stranger and I each get on a treadmill, either the stranger steps off first or I am going to die on the treadmill.
Sometimes it is the very people who no one imagines anything of who do the things no one can imagine.
My life amounts to no more than one drop in a limitless ocean. Yet what is any ocean, but a multitude of drops?
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Our lives are not our own. We are bound to others, past and present, and by each crime and every kindness, we birth our future.
A longing fulfilled is sweet to the soul :)
How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
The world you live in tomorrow hinges on what you do today. Every stroke, every dribble, every line of code you write, written into history as the foundation for the future.
I'll show you how great I am!!
Sometimes the people around you won't understand your journey. They don't need to, it's not for them.
People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
